AppHeader.searchPlaceholder: Ask the AI or search DamDoh...

AppFooter.tagline: Bridging the agricultural supply chain for a thriving people, profit, and planet.

Auth.signInDescription: Enter your credentials to access your account.
Auth.signUpDescription: Join our community of agricultural stakeholders.
Auth.rolePlaceholder: Select your role in the supply chain
Auth.forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
Auth.resetPasswordDescription: Enter and confirm your new password.

about.title: About DamDoh
about.subtitle: Connecting the global agricultural supply chain for a sustainable future.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To empower all stakeholders in the agricultural supply chain, from smallholder farmers to multinational corporations, with the data, tools, and connections needed to thrive in a complex and ever-changing global market. We aim to foster transparency, efficiency, and sustainability from farm to fork.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: A globally connected, data-driven agricultural ecosystem where every participant has the opportunity for sustainable growth and prosperity. We envision a world where technology and collaboration have eliminated food insecurity and built resilient, equitable supply chains.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.content: We are committed to practices that support environmental health, social equity, and economic viability for generations to come.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.content: We believe that by working together, we can solve the industry's biggest challenges. Our platform is built to facilitate partnerships and communication.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.content: We continuously seek and develop cutting-edge solutions, from AI-driven insights to blockchain-based traceability, to serve our community.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.content: We operate with transparency and honesty, building trust among our users by ensuring data privacy, security, and accuracy.

empowerment.title: Empowerment
empowerment.content: We strive to level the playing field by providing all users, regardless of size or location, with access to critical information and market opportunities.

team.title: Our Team
team.intro: DamDoh is led by a diverse team of agronomists, technologists, supply chain experts, and entrepreneurs who are passionate about revolutionizing agriculture.
team.member1Bio: An expert in agronomy and international development with 20 years of experience in sustainable agriculture.
team.member2Bio: A seasoned software architect with a background in building scalable, secure platforms for global logistics.
team.member3Bio: A specialist in forging connections between smallholder cooperatives and international markets.
team.note: Note: Team members are illustrative representations for this demo.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have a question, feedback, or a partnership proposal, please reach out.

callUs.title: Call Us
callUs.hours: Our phone lines are open Monday - Friday, 9 AM - 5 PM (Your Timezone).

ourOffice.title: Our Office
ourOffice.address: 123 Agri-Tech Avenue, Food Security City, Global

sendMessage.title: Send Us a Message
sendMessage.note: Note: This form is for demonstration. Actual submission is not implemented.

knowledgeHub.title: DamDoh Knowledge Hub
knowledgeHub.description: Your central resource for agricultural courses, best practices, and industry insights.

courses.title: Structured Courses
courses.description: Learn at your own pace with our expert-led courses.
courses.body: From sustainable farming techniques to navigating international trade, our courses are designed to provide you with actionable knowledge and skills. Enroll today to start your learning journey.

blog.title: Insights & Articles
blog.description: Stay informed with the aatest news and analysis.
blog.body: Our blog features articles from industry experts on market trends, new technologies, policy changes, and success stories from the community. Stay ahead of the curve.

main.title: Agricultural Events
main.description: Discover and join events, workshops, and conferences near you and around the world.
main.noEventsHint: Try broadening your search or check back later.

errors.signInDescription: You must be signed in to register for events.

coupon.toastDescription: The coupon code "{couponCode}" from your link has been added.
coupon.label: Have a coupon code?
coupon.note: Note: Coupon will be validated upon registration.

registration.successDescription: You are now registered for this event.
registration.discountApplied: A discount of {amount} {currency} has been applied.
registration.notAvailable: Registration for this event is not handled by DamDoh.

share.title: Share this Event
share.description: Copy the link below to share this event with your network.
share.toastDescription: A shareable link has been copied to your clipboard.

ticket.title: Your Event Ticket
ticket.scan: Show this QR code at the event entrance to check in.

notFound.title: Event Not Found
notFound.description: The event you are looking for does not exist or may have been moved.

create.formDescription: Fill out the details below to set up your event and share it with the community.
create.successCardDescription: Your event is now live. You can manage it to track attendees and create promotions.
create.authErrorDescription: You must be logged in to create an event.
create.uploadingDescription: Please wait while your event banner is uploaded.
create.failDescription: An error occurred. Please try again.
create.linkCopiedDescription: The link to your new event has been copied to the clipboard.

form.titlePlaceholder: e.g., Korean Natural Farming Techniques Workshop
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Provide a detailed overview of what your event is about, who should attend, and what they will learn.
form.timeDescription: Specify the start time of your event.
form.locationPlaceholder: e.g., Springfield Community Farm or https://zoom.us/...
form.locationDescription: For physical events, an address. For online, a link.
form.enableRegDescription: Allow users to register and pay directly on the platform.
form.priceDescription: Leave at 0 for a free event.
form.imageUrlDescription: Paste a direct URL to a hosted image.
form.imageUploadDescription: Recommended size 1200x628. Will take priority over image URL.

manage.title: Manage Event
manage.subtitlePlaceholder: Manage your event's details, attendees, and promotions.

create.title: Create New Coupon
create.description: Offer discounts to encourage early registrations or for specific groups.

list.title: Existing Coupons
list.description: Manage and share your current discount coupons.
list.toastDescription: The share link {link} has been copied to your clipboard.
list.noCoupons: No coupons have been created for this event yet.

pinning.pinnedDescription: Forums is now your default homepage.

create.description: Start a new discussion by creating a topic for the community.

form.descriptionPlaceholder: A brief description of what this topic will be about.

auth.title: Authentication Error
auth.description: You must be logged in to create a topic.

incomplete.title: Incomplete Form
incomplete.description: Please fill out the topic name and description.

general.title: Error
general.description: An error occurred while creating the topic.

success.title: Topic Created!
success.description: The new topic was created successfully.

noPosts.title: No Posts Yet
noPosts.description: Be the first to contribute to this topic.

notFound.title: Topic Not Found
notFound.description: This topic may have been deleted or doesn't exist.

loadTopic.title: Failed to Load Topic
loadTopic.description: There was a problem fetching the topic details.

loadPosts.title: Failed to Load Posts
loadPosts.description: There was a problem fetching the posts for this topic.

post.noReplies: No replies yet. Be the first to reply!

notFound.title: Post Not Found
notFound.description: This post may have been deleted or the link is incorrect.

loadPost.title: Failed to Load Post
loadPost.description: There was a problem fetching the post details.

loadReplies.title: Failed to Load Replies
loadReplies.description: There was a problem fetching replies for this post.

submitReply.title: Failed to Add Reply
submitReply.description: An error occurred while submitting your reply. Please try again.

createPost.title: Create a New Post
createPost.description: Share your knowledge or ask a question to the community.

form.titlePlaceholder: Enter a clear and concise title
form.contentPlaceholder: Write your message here. You can include details, ask questions, or share insights.

incomplete.title: Incomplete Post
incomplete.description: Please fill out the title and content fields.

success.title: Post Created!
success.description: Your post has been created successfully.

aiHelper.title: AI Post Helper
aiHelper.description: Need a starting point? Give the AI a prompt to generate a draft.
aiHelper.promptLabel: What do you want to post about?
aiHelper.promptPlaceholder: e.g., 'The challenges of post-harvest storage for smallholder farmers in East Africa'
